item.title: Report X-2025040532
item.description:
Report X-2025040532

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-03
  • City: DAVENPORT
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO THE SPILL WEARING ALL PROPER PPE. USING THE DECISON TREE AND RESPONSE SHEETS USED THE CORROSIVE RESPOSE SHEET TO CONTAIN THE SPILL FOR FURTHER PROCESSING IN THE DMP AREA. PRCOSSING THE SPILL USING THE WASTE DISPOSAL CHART AND THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE SHEEETS WE PROCESSED THE SPILL.
